lead_paragraph: The country’s Olympic team reported “several tens” of cases, which could rule out top athletes for the Rio Games in August.
snippet: The country’s Olympic team reported “several tens” of cases, which could rule out top athletes for the Rio Games in August.
abstract: Mikhail Mamiashvili, Russian Sports Wrestling Federation chief, admits large number of wrestlers have tested positive for doping and says there may not be 'anyone left to go the Olympics;' Russia has dominated sport in past.
